title: Disconnected from chat
body:
My lol says my chat has disconnected so i press the reconnect to chat button and after a while nothing happens 
and my wifi is perfectly fine 

please help

replies.body: This was an issue with the servers last night, and updates were posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything should be fine now, but let me know!
